meanings.sent1: The heavy rain necessitating an umbrella.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard for the exam necessitates good grades.
meanings.sent3: His forgetfulness necessitated a reminder on his phone.
meanings.sent4: The broken car necessitated a trip to the mechanic.
meanings.sent5: The cold weather necessitated wearing a warm coat.
